info.title: Solana JSON-RPC API
info.description: Solana JSON-RPC API specification for interacting with Solana nodes

methods.name: getAccountInfo
methods.summary: Returns all information associated with the account of provided Pubkey

params.name: pubkey
params.description: Pubkey of account to query, as base-58 encoded string

methods.name: getBalance
methods.summary: Returns the lamport balance of the account of provided Pubkey

methods.name: getBlock
methods.summary: Returns identity and transaction information about a confirmed block in the ledger

methods.name: getBlockCommitment
methods.summary: Returns commitment for particular block

methods.name: getBlockHeight
methods.summary: Returns the current block height of the node

methods.name: getBlockProduction
methods.summary: Returns recent block production information from the current or previous epoch

methods.name: getBlockTime
methods.summary: Returns the estimated production time of a block

methods.name: getBlocks
methods.summary: Returns a list of confirmed blocks between two slots

methods.name: getBlocksWithLimit
methods.summary: Returns a list of confirmed blocks starting at the given slot

methods.name: getClusterNodes
methods.summary: Returns information about all the nodes participating in the cluster

methods.name: getEpochInfo
methods.summary: Returns information about the current epoch

methods.name: getEpochSchedule
methods.summary: Returns the epoch schedule information from this cluster's genesis config

methods.name: getFeeForMessage
methods.summary: Returns the fee the network will charge for a particular message

methods.name: getFirstAvailableBlock
methods.summary: Returns the slot of the lowest confirmed block that has not been purged from the ledger

methods.name: getGenesisHash
methods.summary: Returns the genesis hash

methods.name: getHealth
methods.summary: Returns the current health of the node

methods.name: getHighestSnapshotSlot
methods.summary: Returns the highest slot information that the node has snapshots for

methods.name: getIdentity
methods.summary: Returns the identity pubkey for the current node

methods.name: getInflationGovernor
methods.summary: Returns the current inflation governor

methods.name: getInflationRate
methods.summary: Returns the specific inflation values for the current epoch

methods.name: getInflationReward
methods.summary: Returns the inflation / staking reward for a list of addresses for an epoch

methods.name: getLargestAccounts
methods.summary: Returns the 20 largest accounts, by lamport balance

methods.name: getLatestBlockhash
methods.summary: Returns the latest blockhash

methods.name: getLeaderSchedule
methods.summary: Returns the leader schedule for an epoch

methods.name: getMaxRetransmitSlot
methods.summary: Get the max slot seen from retransmit stage

methods.name: getMaxShredInsertSlot
methods.summary: Get the max slot seen from after shred insert

methods.name: getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption
methods.summary: Returns minimum balance required to make account rent exempt

methods.name: getMultipleAccounts
methods.summary: Returns the account information for a list of Pubkeys

methods.name: getProgramAccounts
methods.summary: Returns all accounts owned by the provided program Pubkey

methods.name: getRecentPerformanceSamples
methods.summary: Returns a list of recent performance samples

methods.name: getRecentPrioritizationFees
methods.summary: Returns a list of prioritization fees from recent blocks

methods.name: getSignatureStatuses
methods.summary: Returns the statuses of a list of signatures

methods.name: getSignaturesForAddress
methods.summary: Returns signatures for confirmed transactions that include the given address

methods.name: getSlot
methods.summary: Returns the slot that has reached the given or default commitment level

methods.name: getSlotLeader
methods.summary: Returns the current slot leader

methods.name: getSlotLeaders
methods.summary: Returns the slot leaders for a given slot range

methods.name: getStakeMinimumDelegation
methods.summary: Returns the stake minimum delegation, in lamports

methods.name: getSupply
methods.summary: Returns information about the current supply

methods.name: getTokenAccountBalance
methods.summary: Returns the token balance of an SPL Token account

methods.name: getTokenAccountsByDelegate
methods.summary: Returns all SPL Token accounts by approved Delegate

methods.name: getTokenAccountsByOwner
methods.summary: Returns all SPL Token accounts by token owner

methods.name: getTokenLargestAccounts
methods.summary: Returns the 20 largest accounts of a particular SPL Token type

methods.name: getTokenSupply
methods.summary: Returns the total supply of an SPL Token type

methods.name: getTransaction
methods.summary: Returns transaction details for a confirmed transaction

methods.name: getTransactionCount
methods.summary: Returns the current Transaction count from the ledger

methods.name: getVersion
methods.summary: Returns the current Solana version running on the node

methods.name: getVoteAccounts
methods.summary: Returns the account info and associated stake for all the voting accounts in the current bank

methods.name: isBlockhashValid
methods.summary: Returns whether a blockhash is still valid or not

methods.name: minimumLedgerSlot
methods.summary: Returns the lowest slot that the node has information about in its ledger

methods.name: requestAirdrop
methods.summary: Requests an airdrop of lamports to a Pubkey

methods.name: sendTransaction
methods.summary: Submits a signed transaction to the cluster for processing

methods.name: simulateTransaction
methods.summary: Simulate sending a transaction
